install.name: go_irresistible
install.author: Ryan de Mulder
install.description:
Template by GO designs.
Please keep a link back to us, as this design cost a lot of work and we distribute it for free...

Positions:
----------
breadcrumbs (CAN be shown in middle column title (set in template menu))
left (self-explanatory)
right (self-explanatory)
footer (self-explanatory)
user1 (=GOmenu, in menu settings, set 'always show sub-menus' to 'yes' and 'show title' to 'no')
user2 (in header part)
user3 (above content, whole width)
user4 (=SEARCH, shown in middle menu title (don't put anything else here, it'll be fucked up :))
user5 (= above content, half-size, left)
user6 (= above content, half-size, right)
user7 (underneath content, above footer)
